Simone Says
by Sly Dog Studios

Simon's significant other is here to try and stump you with the same game that he failed at stumping you with!
Push Start to begin the game. Press the d-pad in the direction and order of the lights that appear on-screen.
Miss once, and you lose. When you complete 16 iterations of the game, you will have also conquered Simone, leaving them a miserable, unhappy and arguing couple.
I hope you're proud of yourself!

https://slydogstudios.org/
